item.title: 2 jsonschema tricks
item.description: Background I worked on APIs and OpenAPI Spec (OAS) in past projects, even I used stoplight and NLP for open-source API style guide enforce and linting. I thought I was quite good at jsonschema. I dontâ€™k think so after recent usage of jsonschema for a very aspnet flexible configuration file. Configurations in dotnet are quite straight forwards if all the configurations following the Options pattern. ConfigurationProcessor is not that case.
